title: SnB Portland
name: SnB Portland
description:
A Map by Fiberlyone

Local SnB meetings

properties.name: Last Thursdays 6:30-8pm
properties.description: Posted by Fiberlyone 4500 SE Stark St, Portland, OR

properties.name: Mondays 7-9
properties.description: Posted by Fiberlyone2185 NW Allie Ave, Hillsboro, ORBella Espresso at Streets of Tanasbourne Bella is on the west side of the mall not far from the Macy\'s parking garage. Feel free to join us

properties.name: Mondays, 6:00 pm - 10:00 pm
properties.description: Posted by Fiberlyone2222 NE Broadway, Portland, ORCostello\'s Travel Caffe Bring your Knitting and Join us in the NE for coffee, desserts and good company! During the Summer Costello\'s is open till 10pm and there is free Wi Fi, Beer, Wine, Soda and a great selection of food from salads and paninis to pizza and soup! http://www.costellostravelcaffe.com/

properties.name: Third Thursdays 7-9pm
properties.description: Posted by Fiberlyone8815 OMara St., Tigard, ORTigard Senior Center The Tigard Knitting Guild is a non-profit organization focusing on promoting and sharing hand knitting in our community. We have members from all over Oregon and SW Washington. Join us. For more information, go to www.tigardknittingguild.org

properties.name: Thursdays 6-9pm
properties.description: Posted by Fiberlyone2142 N Killingsworth, Portland, OR - between Greeley and Interstate Join us every Thursday for Knit Nite at the Naked Sheep Knit Shop ...your place to knit! On Bus line #72 and Near the MAX Yellow line www.thenakedsheepknitshop.com

properties.name: Thursdays 7-9pm
properties.description: Posted by Fiberlyone3041 SE Division St, Portland, ORCome on guys! Bring your friends and head over to Mabel\'s for a beer and some serious knitting!

properties.name: Tuesdays 3-6pm
properties.description: Posted by Fiberlyone5008 SE Hawthorne Blvd, Portland, ORSapphire Hotel Meet up with your friends to knit, crochet, and to exchange ideas in our smoke-free lounge. From the beginner to fiber artists - come one, come all - find patterns, start a project, finish a project...we\'ll be serving our specialty cocktails and ecclectic food menu. www.thesapphirehotel.com ALL WELL DRINKS TOP SHELF COCKTAILS CHILEAN WHITE WINE PORTUGUESE RED WINE PBR TALL BOYS OFF ALL APPETIZERS & CHEESE PLATES Come share your projects and see what other people are creating...just be knotty!

properties.name: Tuesdays 6-9pm
properties.description: Posted by Fiberlyone3041 SE Division, Portland, ORMabel\'s Cafe & Knittery Yes, every night is an open knit night at Mabel\'s, but we thought we\'d make Tuesdays official! Come join the fun, make a buddy, and knit to your heart\'s delight!

properties.name: Tuesdays 6-9pm
properties.description: Posted by Fiberlyone1700 NW Marshall, Portland, ORWine and Chocolate... Need I say more?!

properties.name: Wednesdays 11:00 am - 3:00 pm
properties.description: Posted by Fiberlyone2234 SE 30th Ave, Portland, ORBring a nosh--drinks provided. Kids welcome.

properties.name: Wednesdays 6-10pm
properties.description: Posted by Fiberlyone2140 NE Alberta St, Portland, ORBring your projects and enjoy the company of other knitters and crocheteres. All levels of knitters welcome. Mason jars available to fill with beer and wine.

properties.name: Wednesdays 6-9pm
properties.description: Posted by Fiberlyone7853 SE 13th Ave, Portland, OR
